Text: MILITARY RESALE GROUPMILITARY RESALE GROUP OTC BB BCTL Latest price cents MILITARY RESALE GROUP as a private company with limited capital grew fold breaking Million in revenue MILITARY RESALE GROUP as BCTL a public company now has greater access to capital MILITARY RESALE GROUP last week announced they have increased their space times Watch for revenue to soar times again Military Market Segment Is Hot MILITARY RESALE GROUP ADDS BAYER A MAJOR BRAND TO ITS PRODUCT LINE COLORADO SPRINGS ColoOct Military Resale Group Inc OTCBB BCTL announced today that the Bayer Corporation a leader in the health and beauty aid industry has been added to its product supplier network Bayer is a very well recognized brand name in its market categories nationally and internationally It is estimated that sales of Bayers products can add about annually to revenues of Military Resale Group President Ethan D Hokit commented Military Resale Group is pleased and complimented to have become able to represent such a prestigious manufacturer as Bayer in our distribution activities We have previously forecast that we expect MRGs sales to increase from million in to reach million over the next year Bayers new presence is expected to make a major contribution to this million increase in annual sales that we foresee Military Resale Group Inc was incorporated in when it acquired a yearold distributor to the Military Resale Market At that time MRGs annual sales were and they have since soared fivefold in three years to million in Military Resale Group is now a publicly owned company as a result of its recent acquisition by Bactrol Technologies Inc OTCBB BCTL The Military Resale Market is a billion niche market with authorized patrons which operates under the aegis of the Defense Commissary Agency DeCA a Department of Defense agency The DODs objective in this area is to operate resale store systems which sell groceries at commissaries and general merchandise at exchanges ie PXs at the lowest possible prices The resulting average cost savings of about are a major fringe benefit untaxed to military personnel The competitive structure of the Military Resale Market consists of a few large distributors who do not dominate the industry and hundreds of small ones The post acquisition strategy of MRG is to grow primarily by acquiring other small distributors and secondarily
